entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:11 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
